name: Post Ghost Apocalypse Prototype
description:
Post Ghost Apocalypse is a physics-based FPS with elements of survival horror! 

This prototype is a hodgepodge of different ideas that you don't see too often in the FPS genre (probably for good reason)

this prototype includes

  • Physics-based weapons
  • Diegetic HUD
  • 4 secrets areas
  • Some chills and thrills

I have been using this project as a tool for learning UE4 and I thought it would be an interesting portfolio piece, so I hastily put together this tutorial level to showcase some of the mechanics at play.

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
